response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which we believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. This exceptional item carries a unique value of $15,000 to us, reflecting its quality and the effort put into its creation. We are extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this product at the same value, $15,000, ensuring that you benefit from its full potential without any compromise on cost. We trust that it will meet and exceed your expectations. Should you require more information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 15000}
